name: Audition Replay File
summary: Learn about .ARP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: ARP files do not contain standard video data. Therefore, if you want to save a replay as a video, such as a .WMV or .AVI file, you can use a screen recording application and record the screen while playing back the replay in Audition.

description: Game file created by Audition, a rhythm and dance synchronization game; saves a replay of a song that the player danced to in the game; allows replays to be stored and shared; can be played from the replay option in the game lobby.
